overview.base: You must mana drain at least 3 creatures to death every day or you start taking penalties. If 24 hours pass and you have not fed, you lose your your largest hit die and mana die. Your HP and MP maximums decrease by the value of those dice. For each additional 24 hours you go without feeding, you lose your next largest hit die and mana die. To restore lost hit dice and mana dice, you must feed more than normal. If you feed on at least 6 creatures within a 24 hour period, you restore 1 lost hit die and mana die.

results.hit: Target is dead, ruined, and their SIZE is reduced by 2. If their SIZE was already 2 or less, their body is completely consumed.

overview.base: You gain Offensive Martial Arts and Defensive Martial Arts.

Your hands count as weapons for the purposes of abilities that target or are delivered by (although they cannot be shattered or destroyed). You may attack with them and their damage die is now [[/roll 1d4]].
overview.proficient: The damage die is instead [[/roll 1d6]].
overview.fluent: The damage die is instead [[/roll 1d8]].

overview.base:
Your hands count as shields for the purposes of abilities that target them (although they cannot be shattered or destroyed). You may block with them and their BV is +1.
Note: This does not make your hands blocking.
You gain Bite and become fluent in it. Additionally, your mouth is AV0.

Your mouth counts as a weapon for the purposes of abilities that target or are delivered by it (although it cannot be shattered or destroyed). You may attack with it and its damage die is now [[/roll 1d4]].
overview.proficient: The damage die is instead [[/roll 1d6]].
overview.fluent: The damage die is instead [[/roll 1d8]].

overview.base: You count as being undead for the purposes of abilities, damage, and other effects. You also gain Ethereal Senses, Healing Sensitivity, Slow Mana Drain, Undead Mind, and Undying Durability.
You can see and hear spirits and Ethereal creatures.

Healing can be used to damage you. If the creature providing you healing specifies that they are doing so "for damage" then you roll your largest hit die and take that much holy damage instead of the normal healing effect. This does not consume any of your hit dice.
Deal enough mana drain to kill the target. If this successfully kills the target, you revitalize.
You are immune to being frightened or charmed.

You are immune to unconsciousness, suffocating, and being poisoned. You do not drop due to being at negative HP. You still die when you reach half your maximum HP below zero. You also do not have to breathe.
You always have at least 1 AV. This is the case even when you are not wearing armor.
